Tolkien-related events that took place in 1987.

content.title: April
content.content:
7 - Actor Ismael Cruz CÃ³rdova is born.
23 - Pictures under Discussion is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
27 - The Lost Road and Other Writings is published in the UK.
28 - Actor John Huston dies.

content.title: October
content.content:
8 - Roger Lancelyn Green, Inkling and biographer, dies.
15-16 - The Great Storm, which had been "predicted" by Tolkien in a curious coincidence; in The Notion Club Papers (written in 1945) Tolkien mentions a Great Storm on Thursday, June 12 of 1987, which however actually occurs during October.

content.title: November
content.content: 30 - The Lost Road and Other Writings is published in the US.

content.title: December
content.content: 24 - Terence Tiller, writer of the 1955 radio series of The Lord of the Rings, dies.
